text: The +44, or Plus 44, was a punk rock supergroup that started in 2005. It was started by former Blink-182 members Mark Hoppus and Travis Barker, with guitarist Craig Fairbaugh from the band Transplants, and Shane Gallagher from the Nervous Return. The name of the band is the title of the telephone code for the UK, +44. The band broke up on January 13, 2009, when Blink-182 reformed. == Members == * Mark Hoppus (vocals, bass) * Travis Barker (drums, keyboards) * Craig Fairbaugh (rhythm guitar, vocals) * Shane Gallagher (lead guitar) == Discography == * 2006 - When Your Heart Stops Beating == References == == Other websites == * Category:Blink-182 Category:American punk bands Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2009 Category:Musical groups established in 2005 Category:Musical groups from California Category:2000s American music groups Category:2000s disestablishments in California Category:2005 establishments in California Category:2009 disestablishments in the United States
title: +44 (band)
